briefTitle: Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of Zoster Vaccine Live (ZOSTAVAX™) in Healthy Adults in India (V211-025)
officialTitle: A Phase III Clinical Trial to Study the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of ZOSTAVAX™ in Healthy Adults in India
summary: This study will determine if ZOSTAVAX™ is safe, tolerable, and immunogenic in healthy adults in India.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Geometric Mean Titer (GMT) of Varicella-zoster Virus (VZV) Antibody at 6 Weeks Postvaccination
